overview: A highly experienced Business Executive who has demonstrated the ability to lead diverse teams of business and tech professionals to new levels of success in a variety of highly competitive industries, cutting-edge markets, and fast-paced environments. Strong technical and business qualifications with an impressive track record of more than 10 years of hands-on experience in BU management, strategic business unit development, global sales and marketing management. Proven ability to successfully analyze an organization’s critical business requirements, identify deficiencies and potential opportunities, and develop innovative and cost-effective solutions for continues revenue growth and competitiveness; Creation and build-up of the organizational true competitive advantages and competitive business offerings.
